API_KEY.description: API key used to protect some routes. If you leave this blank anyone will be able to shorten URLs.

DATABASE_URL.description: URL or path to database. Leave this blank if you are using a Heroku add-on for your database.

SHORT_LENGTH.description: Length of shortened IDs. Default is calculated based on length of SHORT_CHARS.

SHORT_CHARS.description: JSON array of characters to used in shortened IDs.

SHORT_REWRITES.description: JSON object of rewrites to normalize shortened IDs. Advanced use only.

HOSTNAME.description: The hostname of this API instance.

SHORTENED_BASE_URL.description: The base URL to build shortened URLs from. If you leave this blank clients will have to assemble shortened URLs themselves.

BLOCKED_HOSTNAMES.description: JSON array of hostnames or domain names that are prevented from being shortened.
